trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure preview portal overview
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure preview portal overview

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Microsoft Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Microsoft Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure preview portal overview
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure preview portal overview

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Azure preview portal is a central place where you can provision and manage your Azure resources.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Azure preview portal is a central place where you can provision and manage your Azure resources.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will familiarize you with the portal and show you how to use some of these key capabilities:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial will familiarize you with the portal and show you how to use some of these key capabilities:

trans-unit.source: A **comprehensive marketplace** that lets you browse through thousands of items from Microsoft and other vendors that can be purchased and/or provisioned.
trans-unit.target: A **comprehensive marketplace** that lets you browse through thousands of items from Microsoft and other vendors that can be purchased and/or provisioned.

trans-unit.source: A **unified and scalable browse experience** that makes it easy to find the resources you care about and perform various management operations.
trans-unit.target: A **unified and scalable browse experience** that makes it easy to find the resources you care about and perform various management operations.

trans-unit.source: **Consistent management pages** (or blades) that let you manage Azure’s wide variety of services through a consistent way of exposing settings, actions, billing information, health monitoring and usage data, and much more.
trans-unit.target: **Consistent management pages** (or blades) that let you manage Azure’s wide variety of services through a consistent way of exposing settings, actions, billing information, health monitoring and usage data, and much more.

trans-unit.source: A **personal experience** that lets you create a customized start screen that shows the information that you want to see whenever you log in.
trans-unit.target: A **personal experience** that lets you create a customized start screen that shows the information that you want to see whenever you log in.

trans-unit.source: You can also customize any of the management blades that contain tiles.
trans-unit.target: You can also customize any of the management blades that contain tiles.

trans-unit.source: Azure Portal UI Orientation
trans-unit.target: Azure Portal UI Orientation

trans-unit.source: Before you get started
trans-unit.target: Before you get started

trans-unit.source: You will need a valid Azure subscription to go through this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will need a valid Azure subscription to go through this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have one, then [sign up for a free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) today.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have one, then [sign up for a free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) today.

trans-unit.source: Once you have a subscription, you can access the portal at [https://portal.azure.com].
trans-unit.target: Once you have a subscription, you can access the portal at [https://portal.azure.com].

trans-unit.source: How to create a resource
trans-unit.target: How to create a resource

trans-unit.source: Azure has a marketplace with thousands of items that you can create from one place.
trans-unit.target: Azure has a marketplace with thousands of items that you can create from one place.

trans-unit.source: Let’s say you want to create a new Windows Server 2012 VM.
trans-unit.target: Let’s say you want to create a new Windows Server 2012 VM.

trans-unit.source: The +NEW hub is your entry point into a curated set of featured categories from the marketplace.
trans-unit.target: The +NEW hub is your entry point into a curated set of featured categories from the marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Each category has a small set of featured items along with a link to the full marketplace that shows all categories and search.
trans-unit.target: Each category has a small set of featured items along with a link to the full marketplace that shows all categories and search.

trans-unit.source: To create that new Windows Server 2012 VM, perform the following actions:
trans-unit.target: To create that new Windows Server 2012 VM, perform the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 is featured, so you can select it from the Compute category.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 is featured, so you can select it from the Compute category.

trans-unit.source: Fill out some basic inputs on a form.
trans-unit.target: Fill out some basic inputs on a form.

trans-unit.source: Click ‘Create’ and you’re VM will begin to provision immediately.
trans-unit.target: Click ‘Create’ and you’re VM will begin to provision immediately.

trans-unit.source: The notifications hub will alert you when your resource has been created and a management blade will open (you can always browse to resources later).
trans-unit.target: The notifications hub will alert you when your resource has been created and a management blade will open (you can always browse to resources later).

trans-unit.source: Portal Categories
trans-unit.target: Portal Categories

trans-unit.source: How to find your resources
trans-unit.target: How to find your resources

trans-unit.source: You can always pin frequently accessed resources to your startboard, but you might need to browse to something that you don’t frequently access.
trans-unit.target: You can always pin frequently accessed resources to your startboard, but you might need to browse to something that you don’t frequently access.

trans-unit.source: The browse hub shown below is your way to get to all of your resources.
trans-unit.target: The browse hub shown below is your way to get to all of your resources.

trans-unit.source: You can filter by subscription, choose/resize columns, and navigate to the management blades by clicking on individual items.
trans-unit.target: You can filter by subscription, choose/resize columns, and navigate to the management blades by clicking on individual items.

trans-unit.source: Browse Hub
trans-unit.target: Browse Hub

trans-unit.source: How to manage and delegate access to a resource
trans-unit.target: How to manage and delegate access to a resource

trans-unit.source: From this blade you can connect to the virtual machine using remote desktop, monitor key performance metrics, control access to this VM using role based access (RBAC), configure the VM, and perform other important management tasks.
trans-unit.target: From this blade you can connect to the virtual machine using remote desktop, monitor key performance metrics, control access to this VM using role based access (RBAC), configure the VM, and perform other important management tasks.

trans-unit.source: Delegating access based on role is critical to managing at scale.
trans-unit.target: Delegating access based on role is critical to managing at scale.

trans-unit.source: Click [here](role-based-access-control-configure.md) to learn more about it.
trans-unit.target: Click [here](role-based-access-control-configure.md) to learn more about it.

trans-unit.source: To delegate access to a resource, perform the following actions:
trans-unit.target: To delegate access to a resource, perform the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Browse to your resource.
trans-unit.target: Browse to your resource.

trans-unit.source: Click ‘All settings’ in the Essentials section.
trans-unit.target: Click ‘All settings’ in the Essentials section.

trans-unit.source: Click ‘Users’ in the settings list.
trans-unit.target: Click ‘Users’ in the settings list.

trans-unit.source: Click ‘Add’ in the command bar.
trans-unit.target: Click ‘Add’ in the command bar.

trans-unit.source: Choose a user and a role.
trans-unit.target: Choose a user and a role.

trans-unit.source: Managing a Resource
trans-unit.target: Managing a Resource

trans-unit.source: How to customize a resource blade
trans-unit.target: How to customize a resource blade

trans-unit.source: Azure preconfigures the blades for your resources, but the tiles on these blades are yours to control.
trans-unit.target: Azure preconfigures the blades for your resources, but the tiles on these blades are yours to control.

trans-unit.source: You can easily go into customize mode to add, remove, resize, or re-arrange the tiles.
trans-unit.target: You can easily go into customize mode to add, remove, resize, or re-arrange the tiles.

trans-unit.source: To customize a blade, perform the following actions:
trans-unit.target: To customize a blade, perform the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Browse to your resource.
trans-unit.target: Browse to your resource.

trans-unit.source: Click the ‘…’
trans-unit.target: Click the ‘…’

trans-unit.source: at the top of the blade you want to customize.
trans-unit.target: at the top of the blade you want to customize.

trans-unit.source: Click ‘Add parts’.
trans-unit.target: Click ‘Add parts’.

trans-unit.source: Start dragging and dropping parts.
trans-unit.target: Start dragging and dropping parts.

trans-unit.source: Customizing Blades
trans-unit.target: Customizing Blades

trans-unit.source: How to get help
trans-unit.target: How to get help

trans-unit.source: If you ever have a problem, we’re here for you.
trans-unit.target: If you ever have a problem, we’re here for you.

trans-unit.source: The portal has a help and support page that can point you in the right direction.
trans-unit.target: The portal has a help and support page that can point you in the right direction.

trans-unit.source: Depending on your [support plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/plans/), you can also create support tickets directly in the portal.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your [support plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/plans/), you can also create support tickets directly in the portal.

trans-unit.source: After creating a support ticket, you can manage the lifecycle of the ticket from within the portal.
trans-unit.target: After creating a support ticket, you can manage the lifecycle of the ticket from within the portal.

trans-unit.source: You can get to the help and support page by navigating to Browse -> Help + support.
trans-unit.target: You can get to the help and support page by navigating to Browse -> Help + support.

trans-unit.source: Help and support
trans-unit.target: Help and support

trans-unit.source: Summary
trans-unit.target: Summary

trans-unit.source: Let’s review what you learned in this tutorial:
trans-unit.target: Let’s review what you learned in this tutorial:

trans-unit.source: You learned how to sign up, get a subscription, and browse to the portal
trans-unit.target: You learned how to sign up, get a subscription, and browse to the portal

trans-unit.source: You got oriented with the portal UI and learned how to create and browse resources
trans-unit.target: You got oriented with the portal UI and learned how to create and browse resources

trans-unit.source: You learned how to create a resource and browse resources
trans-unit.target: You learned how to create a resource and browse resources

trans-unit.source: You learned about the structure or management blades and how you can consistently manage different types of resources
trans-unit.target: You learned about the structure or management blades and how you can consistently manage different types of resources

trans-unit.source: You learned how to customize the portal to bring the information you care about to the front and center
trans-unit.target: You learned how to customize the portal to bring the information you care about to the front and center

trans-unit.source: You learned how to control access to resources using role based access (RBAC)
trans-unit.target: You learned how to control access to resources using role based access (RBAC)

trans-unit.source: You learned how to get help and support
trans-unit.target: You learned how to get help and support

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Azure preview portal radically simplifies building and managing your applications in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Azure preview portal radically simplifies building and managing your applications in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Take a look at the [management blog](http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/topics/management/) to keep up to date as we’re constantly [listening to feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/223579-azure-preview-portal) and making improvements.
trans-unit.target: Take a look at the [management blog](http://azure.microsoft.com/blog/topics/management/) to keep up to date as we’re constantly [listening to feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/223579-azure-preview-portal) and making improvements.

trans-unit.source: [ScottGu’s blog](http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu) is another great place to look for all Azure updates.
trans-unit.target: [ScottGu’s blog](http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu) is another great place to look for all Azure updates.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
